EmailTemplate.name: 201902_Global_Email_GoDirectRouter_WebCast_TM.201902_Global_ThankYou_GoDirectRou
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Watching Our Webcast – How to Optimize Your Network and Pay Less with the GoDirect Router™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
{{lead.First Name:default=Honeywell Operator}},
Thank you for taking the time out of your day to attend the Honeywell Webcast on GoDirect Routers on Thursday, February 21.
To access the replay of the webcast, please click HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/webinar/register/rec/WN_d4aBTGqdQ46KS6k1zBLmxA?meetingId=5P43hMzQZxBPcjMcqAVpIYCjZEkN4L-9z8TC_wTnw2mwIumekTziMw&playId=&action=play]]>. Due to storage purposes, please be reminded this Zoom link is only valid till March 7, 2019.
Please be on the lookout for the next webcast invite.
If you have any comments, concerns or suggestions, please reach out to steven.gomez@honeywell.com <[[mailto:steven.gomez@honeywell.com]]>. We look forward to seeing you in March!
Best regards,
Honeywell GoDirect
